items.title: Stuhler2020NP-TLL in the edge channels of a QSHI
items.filename: Stuhler2020NP-TLL in the edge channels of a QSHI.pdf
items.desc: TLL in the edge channels of a QSHI, which may be used to explain the regime of the anomalous differential conductance around zero Fermi energy. Based on this paper and related paper, we can think how to combine the effect into a tip, maybe a e-e interaction tip~ more refs research should investigate. Otherwise, the paper is quiet well written.

items.title: Leraand2025arXiv-Spin-dependent quasiparticle lifetimes in altermagnets
items.filename: Leraand2025arXiv-Spin-dependent quasiparticle lifetimes in altermagnets.pdf
items.desc: the model they used to describe the altermagnet may be a possible model for our potential works. The refs they given for the topological phase within altermagnet can be seen carefully. The author have also done similiar the works within the altermagnet model, which could be considered to check, especially the cases about e-e, e-p and p-h interactions.

items.title: Glodzik2020PRB-How to measure the Majorana polarization of a topological PJJ

items.desc: this paper provide a new view to distinguish the Majorana through its polarization, and suggest STM can be used to detect these polarization. The Hamiltonian which included STM could be right, maybe we can used its form in the following STM works.
